trans-unit.source: A query cursor event is raised on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> objects whenever the mouse pointer moves to a new location.
trans-unit.target: 查詢資料指標就會引發事件上<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>物件每當滑鼠指標移到新位置。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.QueryCursorEventArgs"></xref> class, by using the specified mouse device and the specified timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.QueryCursorEventArgs"></xref>類別，使用指定的滑鼠裝置和指定的時間戳記。

trans-unit.source: The logical mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件相關聯的邏輯的滑鼠裝置。

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.QueryCursorEventArgs"></xref> class, by using the specified mouse device, timestamp, and stylus device.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.QueryCursorEventArgs"></xref>類別，使用指定的滑鼠裝置、 時間戳記和手寫筆裝置。

trans-unit.source: The logical mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件相關聯的邏輯的滑鼠裝置。

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
The stylus pointer associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆指標與此事件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cursor associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與此事件相關聯的游標。

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 特定類型的方式，可以增加事件系統的效率，叫用事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.QueryCursorEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將泛型處理常式轉換為<xref:System.Windows.Input.QueryCursorEventHandler>然後再叫用它。</xref:System.Windows.Input.QueryCursorEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需這項實作模式及它的理由的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>和[路由傳送事件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: 若要以特定類型的方式呼叫泛型處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: 要呼叫的處理常式上的目標。
